titles.title: A resolution to make majority party appointments to a Senate Committee under Paragraph 3(c) of Rule XXV for the One Hundred and Third Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Appoints Senators Bryan (Chairman), Mikulski, and Daschle as the majority party membership of the Senate Select Committee on Ethics.
